title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
subtitle: Choose the plan that's right for your business

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small businesses getting started with AI

questions.question: What are AI operations?
questions.answer: AI operations include any action performed by our AI systems, such as processing documents, analyzing data, or automating workflows.

questions.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

questions.question: Is there a free trial?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all paid plans. No credit card required.

questions.question: What support is included?
questions.answer: All plans include access to our knowledge base and community forums. Paid plans include email support, with priority support for Professional and Enterprise plans.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses transforming with AI
